data.title: Param Gill's Journey from Monk to Dentist to Filmmaker
data.meta_description:
Param Gill is an American film director and writer of Indian origin, who is driven by an incredible passion for cinema and is known for directing films that tackle diverse themes. He is active in Hollywood and the Bollywood film industry and has won numerous awards for his films.

He is also the CEO of FlickBag, a film production and distribution company based in Silicon Valley and Beverly Hills, California.

Know more about him here www.paramgill.com

 

"Where East Meets West" is a collaboration between Ep.Log Media Network & America Meditating Radio

Subscribe now to get notified about the latest episodes!

 

You can follow us and leave us feedback on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter @eplogmedia,

If you like this show, please subscribe and leave us a review wherever you get your podcasts, so other people can find us. You can also find us on https://www.eplog.media
